channel.title: DragonScape [24/7] [No lag]
channel.description:
DragonScape is a new Rs private server 667 loading 711 (basically a 711 server), 24/7 (except during power outages), No lag, small community (everyone knows each other), staff spots open (don't ask you will be chosen... or not...), The server improves and updates about 3x the speed of real Rs, We are always expanding and changing and open to any suggestions from players...
ip: Fuzziferus.no-ip.biz port: 5555 version: 667 loading 711 client: Matrix (only one i know works) Download: https://dl.dropbox.com/u/93849532/DragonScape%20Client.jar webclient: https://dl.dropbox.com/u/93849532/Web%20Client.html pics:
Edgeville (graphics): [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/16i9vgp.png[/img]
Nex(voice play =P): [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/1zlwu15.png[/img]
Completionist emote + Spawn (more graphics): [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2eeg5zs.png[/img]
Notes: *If no one is online please try back at any random time(the server is just being launched)...*
*Feel free to use this server ip and port to advertise anywhere for the server*
*Some things are leeched majorly i haven't gotten around to taking them out or changing them(just making new updates)*
*Please vote on the server (in many cases this can cause a population increase if enough votes)*
